BriefSummary: The crested bunting (Emberiza lathami) is a species of bird in the family Emberizidae, from South and Southeast Asia.
WikiContents:
The crested bunting (Emberiza lathami) is a species of bird in the family Emberizidae, from South and Southeast Asia. 


== Range ==
It is found from the Himalayas to southern-central China and Vietnam.


== Habitat ==
Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical dry lowland grassland.
